casebody.data:
NASH HOSPITALS, INC.
v.
STATE FARM MUTUAL AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE CO. 340P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Scott Lewis, Attorney at Law, Pamela Renee Lawrence, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, for State Farm Mutual Automobile Insurance Co. J. Christopher Dunn, Attorney at Law, for Nash Hospitals, Inc.

Pamela L. Carter, Attorney at Law

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of October 2017 by Robert L. Allgood for Admission Pro Hac Vice:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
